cause.description:
"Life is rarely Fair..." -Garlan of Thorandall
1. Astound audiences with a new form of live theatrical entertainment
2. Open the doors to new talent in New York City
3. Promote better caliber of work on the great stages
4. Aid the growth of new work being produced in proffesional theater
cause.mission: Stage a full NYC production of Deakin/De Gre's Fantasy Musical Adventure: Spellbound
cause.name: Get 'Spellbound- A Musical Adventure' to the NY Stage!
